name: bilobed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
with two lobes (= separate parts): The pecan nut has a smooth, thin, hard, tan shell enclosing a bilobed, golden brown kernel. This type of leukocyte typically has a bilobate (two-lobed) nucleus. Compare
trilobed
More examplesFewer examplesThis is a benign inherited trait resulting in neutrophils with bilobed nuclei.Hooded seals are named for their bilobed hood, an enlargement of the nasal cavity on the heads of males.The creature had a bilobed head and a pair of tentacles.These white blood cells have a nucleus that is bilobed.The specimen is a bilobate fossil consisting of two narrow lobes.
